tech_news.title: Google rolling out Notification Organizer to Pixel - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: Following AI Summaries last month, Google is rolling out the Notification Organizer to Pixel phones with Android 16 QPR2.

tech_news.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle update adds an outfit suitable to eat chilled monkey brains in - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: The team at MachineGames has issued a new update for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.

tech_news.description: Track your playtime, Trophies, and more

tech_news.title: Google’s first AI glasses expected next year - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Google is working on various types of AI-powered glasses — one model is designed for screen-free assistance, using built-in speakers, microphones, and cameras to allow the user to communicate with Gemini and take photos. The other model has an in-lens display…

tech_news.title: Assassin's Creed Black Flag Resynced Has Been Rated By PEGI - Nintendo Life
Some of Ikea’s Matter-compatible smart devices are now available in the US - The Verge
tech_news.description: We also finally know how some of the hardware will be priced in the US.

tech_news.title: Exclusive: Cyberpunk: The Trading Card Game Revealed, Featuring Characters From 2077, Edgerunners, and More - IGN
tech_news.description: The team behind the Cyberpunk TCG reveals how the game is being built, showcasing early art, character choices, and insight into the collaboration with CD Projekt Red.

tech_news.title: BAFTA Games Awards 2026 Longlists Unveiled - The Hollywood Reporter
tech_news.description: The BAFTA Games Awards ceremony will take place in London on April 17, with the longlists containing the likes of 'Indiana Jones and the Great Circle,' 'F1 25' and 'Jurassic World Evolution 3.'

tech_news.title: Pebble's founder introduces a $75 AI smart ring for recording brief notes with a press of a button - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Named for the finger where the ring is meant to be worn, the new $75 Index 01 ring is not meant to be a competitor to the always-on, always-listening AI devices, like the AI pendant Friend, but instead offers a way to record quick notes and reminders with a p…

tech_news.title: Google extends free repairs to cover known Pixel 9 Pro and Pro Fold issues - The Verge
tech_news.description: Pixel 9 Pro and Pro XL smartphones with vertical lines on their display or flickering screens are now eligible for an extended repair program.
